class.summary: Hold the information about extra properties in the picture requested such as size and filters

member.name: Id
member.summary: Id of the image to fetch from the API, starts at 1

member.name: Seed
member.summary: Computed string value used to return the same image from the original string value

member.name: GrayScale
member.summary: Indicates if the Grayscale filter is enable

member.name: Width
member.summary: Whit in pixels of the requested image

member.name: Height
member.summary: Indicates if the Grayscale filter is enable
member.remarks: If null the value of the will be used instead
